Sent: Sunday, 7 June, 2009 6:07:42 PM

First I got the Jonas Brothers. Then I got a note:
The URL contained a malformed video ID.

"Malformed"? eeyew.
AH! It had the period stuck to it.

urls need to have a blank space after them, to work (in e-mail)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EpeqPdVyQd0

messages.subject: David Mitchell on television
messages.msgSnippet: David Mitchell is a British comedian who has a column in The Observer. He is really good at ranting in the most wonderfully ascerbic way. I enjoyed his rant on
messages.messageBody:
David Mitchell is a British comedian who has a column in The Observer. He is really good at ranting in the most wonderfully ascerbic way. I enjoyed his rant on television this week: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EpeqPdVyQd0. It isn't an unschooling perspective, but he does talk about the guilt he felt at not experiencing childhood as intensely as he was exhorting to do.

I thought others might enjoy it as well.

Schuyler


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
